text: Tagetes laxa is a South American species of marigolds in the sunflower family. It is native to Bolivia and northern Argentina (Jujuy, Salta, Tucumán).Jørgensen, P. M., M. H. Nee & S. G. Beck. (eds.) 2014. Catálogo de las plantas vasculares de Bolivia, Monographs in systematic botany from the Missouri Botanical Garden 127(1–2): i–viii, 1–1744.Jørgensen, P. M., M. H. Nee & S. G. Beck. (eds.) 2015. Catálogo de las plantas vasculares de Bolivia (adiciones).Cabrera, Angel Lulio 1937. Notas del Museo de la Plata, Botánica 2: 189 ==References== ==External links== laxa Category:Flora of Bolivia Category:Flora of Argentina Category:Plants described in 1937 Category:Taxa named by Ángel Lulio Cabrera
title: Tagetes laxa
